---
title: "Chocolate Chips Cookie <br> 巧克力曲奇"
categories: [Dessert]
image: ./Images/choco-cookie.jpg
---

### 🥣 Ingredients | 用料

| Ingredient                 | 用料       | Amount | 份量   |
| -------------------------- | -------- | ------ | ---- |
| Unsalted butter (softened) | 无盐黄油（软化） | 225 g  | 225克 |
| Light brown sugar          | 红糖       | 100 g  | 100克 |
| Granulated sugar           | 白砂糖      | 100 g  | 100克 |
| Milk                       | 牛奶       | 30 ml  | 30毫升 |
| Eggs (large)               | 鸡蛋（大）    | 2      | 2个   |
| All-purpose flour          | 中筋面粉     | 400 g  | 400克 |
| Baking powder              | 泡打粉      | 5 g    | 5克   |
| Salt                       | 盐        | 10 g   | 10克  |
| Chocolate chips            | 巧克力豆     | 300 g  | 300克 |


### 🍴 Steps | 步骤

1. Melt the butter and stir on medium heat until light brown.
  将黄油放入锅中，中火加热并搅拌，直到颜色变为浅棕色。

2. Remove from heat and add both sugars, stirring until combined.
   离火后加入红糖和白糖，搅拌至混合均匀。

3. Gradually add milk and stir until the mixture becomes a slightly runny paste.
   逐渐加入牛奶，搅拌至呈稀一点的膏状。

4. Let the mixture cool down slightly, then add eggs and stir until smooth.
   稍微放凉后加入鸡蛋，搅拌至顺滑。

5. Transfer the mixture to a large bowl, then add flour, salt, baking powder, and chocolate.
   将混合物倒入大碗中，加入面粉、盐、泡打粉和巧克力。

6. Stir until everything is evenly mixed and smooth.
   搅拌至完全均匀、顺滑。

7. Preheat the oven to 165°C (330°F).
   将烤箱预热至165°C（330°F）。

8. Scoop about 75 g of cookie dough per cookie and form into balls.
   取约75克面团一份，搓成圆球状。

9. Bake for about 13 minutes.
   烘烤约13分钟。

10. Remove the tray and let the cookies cool (do not poke them — they’ll be very soft).
    取出烤盘，放凉（不要戳饼干，刚出炉时非常柔软）。
